articles.title: T-cells from common colds may help fight Covid: Study - Ahmedabad Mirror
articles.description:
People with higher levels of T-cells from common cold coronaviruses are less likely to become infected with SARS-CoV-2, according to a new research.

The study, by Imperial College London researchers, provides the first evidence of a protective role for these…
